Interface JobMonitor

    public interface JobMonitor
    Monitor job / batch status

      • getCurrentJobs

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCurrentJobs()
        Gets the current running jobs
        Returns:

      • getJobStatus

        java.lang.String getJobStatus(java.lang.String jobId)
        Sets the flow to be used with the flow runner
        Parameters:
        jobId - the flow object to be used
        Returns:
        string denoting the status of the running job, ex: "running step 1"

      • getBatchStatus

        java.lang.String getBatchStatus(java.lang.String jobId,
                                java.lang.String batchId)
        Sets the flow to be used with the flow runner
        Parameters:
        jobId - the id of the job
        batchId - the id of the batch
        Returns:
        string denoting status of the batch

      • getStepBatchStatus

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getStepBatchStatus(java.lang.String jobId,
                                                                    java.lang.String step)
        Sets the flow to be used with the flow runner
        Parameters:
        jobId - the id of the batch
        step - the step of the job
        Returns:
        Map containing batch id and status of the batch
